code: export var fadeIn=function fadeIn(direction){return{hidden:{opacity:0,y:direction==='down'?-85:85},visible:{opacity:1,y:0}};};export var reveal=function reveal(){return{hidden:{left:0},visible:{left:'100%'}};};export var scale=function scale(){return{hidden:{scale:0,opacity:0},visible:{scale:1,opacity:1}};};
